vote.text: Amendment SA 2654 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2654 proposed by Senator Bennet for Senator Akaka. (consideration: CR S10251; text: CR S10251) To improve the bill.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2654 proposed by Senator Bennet for Senator Akaka.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2654 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
